title: AI Mentoring-Accompanied First Steps in Programming: Self-Regulated Learning-Based Intensive Short-Term Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Providing easy smartphone-based accessibility in PC-unavailable environments. Integrated science-programming education for solving real-life problems.

learning_goals: Learners can implement foundational programming logic (conditional statements, loops) with over 80% accuracy using AI real-time feedback
Learners apply self-regulated learning strategies to develop personalized weekly study plans and adjust them at least three times
Learners complete programming projects that solve scientific problems (e.g., simple environmental data visualization) through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
